name: rocket-bot
description: Rocket Bot is used in the CosmoQuest Discord server

scripts.start: echo "It is HIGHLY RECOMMENDED that you use the Docker version of this project. See ../README.md" & echo "It is HIGHLY RECOMMENDED that you use the Docker version of this project. See ../README.md" & echo "It is HIGHLY RECOMMENDED that you use the Docker version of this project. See ../README.md" & echo "It is HIGHLY RECOMMENDED that you use the Docker version of this project. See ../README.md" & echo "It is HIGHLY RECOMMENDED that you use the Docker version of this project. See ../README.md" && node main.js
scripts.rebuild: docker build . -t rocket-bot:v$npm_package_version && docker stop rocket-bot && docker container rm rocket-bot && docker run --name rocket-bot -d rocket-bot:v$npm_package_version
